spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The gnome is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence. It has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Gnome Cunning
entries: The gnome has advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom and Charisma saving throws against magic.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: {@hit 2} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage.
